Articles.Content:
Would love to see fairings for connecting Mk2 or Mk3 parts to round bases or other mk3 bases. Just with that any "unorthodox" thing I design (Ex. making an hidden ejection pod) I would be able to make it look more natural instead of patching it with metal plates. 

That's the only suggestion I have at the moment, look forward to playing more 1.0 when I have more time, very excited. Might mess around with challenges on the forums here. Love someone made an SLS one, Mad a stock SLS along with an Orion capsule when information began to be released about it.
This thread is from 2015 - three years ago. Since that suggestion, a lot has changed about the game, so I'll lock this now.
